scripts.dev-redis: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && cross-env ENV='development' nodemon index.js
scripts.dev: npm run dev-client & cross-env ENV='development' nodemon index.js
scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.build-client-windows: npm run clean-windows && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-windows: start /b npm run dev-client-windows && start nodemon index.js
scripts.dev-client-windows: npm run clean-windows && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.clean-windows: if exist .cache rd /s /q ".cache" && if exist client/dist rd /s /q "client/dist"
